data.title: spotify-playlist-archive/playlists/pretty/37i9dQZF1DWYtpM7d4h5Xa.md at main · mackorone/spotify-playlist-archive
data.meta_description: Daily snapshots of public Spotify playlists. Contribute to mackorone/spotify-playlist-archive development by creating an account on GitHub.
data.text:
pretty - cumulative - plain - githistory

50 best examples of catchy pop tunes that borrowed their melodies from classical music. Each song is followed by its classical inspiration.

Spotify - 20,964 likes - 100 songs - 8 hr 1 min
